title: attack-agent
description: This target type contains an Attack Agenttarget. In addition to the inherited properties, this section defines threeadditional specific properties that are valid for this type. For a Calderaagent example see [CalderaAgent] for more details.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be attack-agent.

address.description: The IP address or domain name of the Attack agent that should execute the attack command sent to it.

agent-type.description: The type of agent being used. The values for this property MUST come from the attack-agent-type vocabulary.
